reviewText: Enjoyed this old western. Give it a look!
I loved it..it was a good show..looking for more Rand Brooks dvds. tv and movies and collector items.and memorabilia. thank you

This is the definition of a genre film if ever there was one. It's a story of a gambler out west who gets into trouble and has to end up shooting his way out of it. In that sense it's a truely classic picture and perhaps the one that defined the genre. Think The Sting if it was set in the wild west and you have a pretty good idea of what this film is about. The restoration work on the film is well done adn it looks like it could have been filmed yesterday.
